text: Meet the Parents is a 2000 American comedy movie. It was produced by Robert De Niro, Jay Roach, Jane Rosenthal and Nancy Tenenbaum and was directed by Jay Roach. Meet the Parents is a remake of the 1992 movie of the same name. There were two sequels to Meet the Parents. The first sequel was Meet the Fockers, which was released in 2004. The second sequel was Little Fockers, which was released in 2010. == Cast == *Ben Stiller as Gaylord "Greg" Focker *Robert De Niro as Jack Byrnes *Blythe Danner as Dina Byrnes *Teri Polo as Pam Byrnes *James Rebhorn as Dr. Larry Banks *Jon Abrahams as Denny Byrnes *Phyllis George as Linda Banks *Kali Rocha as Flight Attendant *Thomas McCarthy as Dr. Robert "Bob" Banks *Nicole DeHuff as Deborah "Debbie" Byrnes *Owen Wilson as Kevin Rawley == Other websites == * Meet the Parents' Official website * * Category:2000 comedy movies Category:American comedy movies Category:American movie remakes Category:English-language movies Category:Movies directed by Jay Roach Category:Movies shot in Chicago Category:Movies set in Chicago Category:Movies set in New York (state) Category:DreamWorks Pictures movies Category:Universal Pictures movies
title: Meet the Parents
